name: Red Room
neighborhood_overview: Nice residential neighborhood in one of the nicest areas of Boston.
description:
Nicely furnished, sunny and comfortable bedroom in a house, in a safe Boston neighborhood 35 minutes from downtown Boston via public transportation ( 2 min. Walk to MBTA bus, that goes to the subway station at Forest Hills). There is a laundromat with an excellent wash, dry, & fold service (not too expensive) close by. Most of the local colleges & universities are within 45 minutes. Parking is available in front of the house on the street. Continental breakfast (cereal, toast, coffee, tea).

The space
This is a room for one person, near the bathroom, on the second floor. Armoire with hanging space and 4 drawers. Desk with lamp, wifi.

Guest access
Common space includes living room and limited kitchen privileges.

Other things to note
Access to the washer and dryer are available for a small fee.

License number
STR-406665
